revision.text: '''Rindo''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, at least 15, but no more than 20 points of bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
